# 9.0 Docs

## Windows Forms

- [BindingSource.SortDescriptions doesn't return null](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/9.0/sortdescriptions-return-value.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 9 for Windows Forms where BindingSource.SortDescriptions no longer returns null if the data source is not an IBindingListView.
- [Changes to nullability annotations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/9.0/nullability-changes.md): Learn about the .NET 9 breaking change in Windows Forms where some nullable reference type annotations have changed.
- [ComponentDesigner.Initialize throws ArgumentNullException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/9.0/componentdesigner-initialize.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 9 for Windows Forms where ComponentDesigner.Initialize now throws ArgumentNullException if the component argument is null.
- [DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Name starting row index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/9.0/datagridviewrowaccessibleobject-name-row.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 9 for Windows Forms where the starting index for the DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Name property is now 1 instead of 0.
- [IMsoComponent support is opt-in](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/9.0/imsocomponent-support.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 9 for Windows Forms where IMsoComponent support is now opt-in.
- [New security analyzers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/9.0/security-analyzers.md): Learn about the .NET 9 breaking change in Windows Forms where new security analyzers have been introduced to prevent accidental leaks of sensitive data.
- [No exception if DataGridView is null](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/9.0/datagridviewheadercell-nre.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 9 for Windows Forms where DataGridViewHeaderCell methods no longer throw an exception if the DataGridView property is null.
- [PictureBox raises HttpClient exceptions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/9.0/httpclient-exceptions.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 9 for Windows Forms where `PictureBox` raises HttpClient exceptions for network errors when loading an image from a URL.
- [StatusStrip uses a different default renderer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/9.0/statusstrip-renderer.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 9 for Windows Forms where System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip uses a different default value for the RenderMode property.
